website_summaries.verdict: This bra offers both comfort and support for those who need it while working out. Good option for those with larger chests.
pros: Underwire and light lining makes it ideal for larger-chested women or those seeking added level of support
Adjustable back straps ensure that fit is perfect every time
Comfortable to wear during vigorous activity or for long periods of time
cons: Band size of this bra runs a bit small

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. I'm a 36DD and have had such an issue finding a sports bra that fits. If I can find one to fit the 36 then the cups are too small and my boobs just pop out the sides or front.I am an avid gym person and love to Run so support is important to me. very minimal bounce if at all with this bra. I tried it on asap and then wore it to work to try out. I work 13hr shift work in the nursing field and 8 hours into the shift and it's still awesome. I will be buying another. Best bang for my bucks! So happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Heather U

customer_reviews.title: This is the sports bra dreams are made of!
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with this sports bra! I normally wear size 36DD, and it is difficult to find a sports bra that fits in the band without being too small in the cup. I ordered the 36E and it is a perfect fit! It is supportive while running, lifting and doing yoga and does pretty well at wicking the sweat. And the price is unbeatable for a large cup sports bra! Just one-click it. You wont be sorry
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poorly placed seams and hardware
customer_reviews.text: So I gave this product 3 stars because if I didn't have ridiculously large breasts, I think this bra would have worked well. Unfortunately after only 20 min of interval training, this bra left raw gouges on both of my shoulders. I don't recommend it for DD
customer_reviews.author: Czygan

customer_reviews.title: Buy this now!
customer_reviews.text: Yes! Yes! Yes! I do a lot of HIIT training and I need a bra that can handle that kind of impact. Finding a high impact sports bra in my size of 36DDD is very difficult. I laugh at bras sized S, M, and L so I jump on sports bras with band and cup sizes. This sports bra is amazing and then at this price point puts it over the top. I purchased a 36E and it’s perfect full coverage with no boob spillage and burpee approves. I plan to order the other two colors.
customer_reviews.author: Laina M. Tallerico

customer_reviews.title: New Favorite
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite sports bra for Zumba! & core strength training. Supportive & smooths back & side rolls. For reference: Size 40C, 5'6", 156 lbs, 56 years old...and still kickin' ass 💪 teehee ;)
customer_reviews.author: Cecelia H.

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed..
customer_reviews.text: Too small. Amazon did not provide any return mechanism nor helpful information for returning this product....very disappointed...too small and no mechanism for returning. Return instructions only run you in circles. Amazon you can do better than this. After being run in circles looking for how to return this item for the past month, now i get a message that it is no longer returnable since I had it for over 30 days. I feel really feel let down by amazon. Now I have $22 dollar product I will never wear. If this is how I save money on amazon, then I guess I've learned my lesson to just buy elsewhere, too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Dancer

customer_reviews.title: 5 5" 142 lb. Usually 34DDD.  FITS PERFECTLY. Ordered 34DD
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5 5", weigh 142 lb. and usually wear a 34DDD/34E. I ordered 34DD of this bra and somehow it fits wonderfully. I already wore it twice, one day for weightlifting and one day for a 3 mile outdoor run+gym. Amazing!! Holds my breasts in perfectly. I will try to take pictures in addition to updating this once I have washed my bra. I hope it holds up in the wash as I love this bra too much for it not to! (I also plan to order another one in a 34 DDD if it's available, perhaps it'll be even more perfect).
customer_reviews.author: Hanna

customer_reviews.title: other the the cup size being off its a very good bra that holds great
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one I’ve ordered, one grey and this black. Ordered 36DD grey & 34DD Black. The grey was big so that’s why I went with a 34 but still needed the DD cup. The black one in no way was a DD but was a D size even though the tag said DD, other the the cup size being off its a very good bra that holds great
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Not as described at all.
customer_reviews.text: I am a 38 D I do not need any padding to help fill out a bra. And besides I hate the look of it. This bra says it is lightly lined. I take that to mean a actual lightweight fabric lining. Well the lining is more than that. It is padded. and the whole thing is bulky and not attractive. I wanted a simple razor back bra to wear with a dress that has a razor back top to it. This sure isn't it. It is going back!!!! If you aren't looking for a padded bra forget this one.
customer_reviews.author: J L W

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to Put On
customer_reviews.text: How are you even supposed to put this on without outside assistance? I honestly don't know if it works well, because after several minutes, a lot of contortion, and much cursing, I just threw it back in it's package and sent it back to Amazon. Perhaps very small or very flexible people would have more luck, but I have no desire to pull random women in the locker room aside to help me get into my bra.
customer_reviews.author: Ariella

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sports bra. I can't stand any bra that i have to keep rearranging myself all day or that gives me a uniboob. This one keeps you seperated and in place. If it were not a pullover i would use this as my everyday bra. I wear a 36C. Ordered a 36C and it fit perfectly. That NEVER happens. I highly recomend this bra.
customer_reviews.author: Ashkste11

customer_reviews.title: Right around chest but great for high impact workout.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 36G and it fits right around the chest (even on the last hooks) but not completely uncomfortable. I wouldn’t recommend wearing all day but definitely has support and coverage for anyone. I didn’t purchase to wear while working out, but it has the support to do so. It does fit tight in the chest but for high impact and a large chest, it’s definitely what you want and need. I would recommend if pulling over your head and hooking bra strap behind your back isn’t a problem. If it is, I would suggest a different style for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Kwil15

customer_reviews.title: Great support!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I’m impressed with this sports bra!! Being larger in the chest department, it’s been a struggle!! I am a 34G in Wacoal brand ... but I got this in a 34 DD And it actually fits !! No pooching or spillage near the arm pits and barely pooches in the cleavage, which I’m not worried about because #1, it doesn’t show through my tank top and #2, i’m starting a vigorous walking routine and plan on shrinking!! Great quality fabric and great support!! I could run or anything and feel confident in this bra!!
customer_reviews.author: K Leeper

customer_reviews.title: The size is too small
customer_reviews.text: I did not like anything about this bra! It runs extremely small. I could not get this over my head to put on. Do not purchase this! This is made for a young girl, not a woman!
customer_reviews.author: mslovestoshop

customer_reviews.title: Great bra for big breasts!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a 36G and I ordered both sizes 36 and 38G, the 38G fits better around the band. The cups in both sizes fit PERFECTLY. I wore one to workout today and it was very comfortable. I wasn’t expecting much for $21, but I’m sooooo glad I took a chance on this bra. I have Panache bras that I’ve had for years, they’re usually around 60-70 dollars (well worth the price), so I was really skeptical about purchasing such an affordable bra. I’m so glad I took a chance. These bras wash well and wear well...time will tell how well they hold up. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: FashionDIVA

customer_reviews.title: not easy to use hook and eye closure
customer_reviews.text: Fortunately for me this fit without securing the hook and eye closure. I just put it over my head. If it stretches out over time I hope I can use the hook and eye and then put over my head. It is too tight to do that at first. If you have help at home or are good at doing this after you put it on, using your hands behind your back maybe it wouldn't be a problem for you. Other than that it looks good, provides support and is comfortable once you get it on.
customer_reviews.author: justwrite

customer_reviews.title: Nice bra, but ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 38E, and the size was perfect. Soft and the hubs liked the look. Unfortunately this just wasn't going to be good for running. This would be a great bra for light motion (maybe yoga or just a lifting WOD at crossfit) but not running. Also, I have big trapezius muscles, and the straps were going to dig after a while. Returning it, but regretfully. If the straps weren't pinchy, I'd keep it, for the price.
customer_reviews.author: TeriFL

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bra I have found the holy grail finally please buy this
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for a bra that fits right for so long. I am a 34 DD and that’s what I bought this bra in. Normally boobs go bouncing everywhere but this holds them rock solid, I expect a little jiggle when running but this is the best bra I have worn it is very flattering under shirts, can be adjusted to show cleavage or not if you want, nice full coverage and molding of the cups, uniboob is impossible with this one. I think I’m going to buy one in every color!! Amazing quality no joke best quality bra I’ve ever had they all suck
customer_reviews.author: Emily1075

customer_reviews.title: Great support AND adjustable arms and back!
customer_reviews.text: Great support! Adjustable straps and back are PERFECT. I'm not sure why ALL sports bras aren't adjustable. Good amount of support in the cup: enough to not let details show through, but not so much to feel "padded". I am glad people still make an underwire sports bra because some of us out here need them. Considering purchasing again in a different color. Two thumbs up from this runner and circuit training lady!
customer_reviews.author: KJ the Science Nerd

customer_reviews.title: Best. Bra. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best sports bra I have EVER bought. I like it so much, I have 5 and will buy more. I'm a 40DD and these hold me steady and strong for Crossfit worh NO problem. They're also so well built they help my posture and even hold in my 'pit meat'... yall know what I'm talking about. That little bit that hangs out the top of every pretty bra we have. No maam. Not here. These are tank top worthy! Buy them and thank me... right up until you have to peel out of it while tired and sweaty. That's a little rough. LOL These are so supportive and flattering, I've worn them under tshirts just because.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Ann Petrone

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable for working out on but my boobs look great!
customer_reviews.text: Well I guess I should have expected it to be a lot less comfortable with an underwire but it does make my boobs look so much better than the uniboob we women get with regular sports bras. Also it’s hard to get off and on with the clasp. And it doesn’t offer a lot of side boob support lol
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Becker

customer_reviews.title: Great sports bra with support
customer_reviews.text: I struggled for a long time to find a sports bra on a budget with support that did not squish the girls together. I hate boob sweat, so keeping them separated is critical. I needed something for high impact. This one does all of that. Feels very much like a real bra since it has the underwire, but I still love it. Seemed a bit bigger than I expected, but not enough to prevent from wearing. I wear 38 DDD
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Stehlin

customer_reviews.title: The BEST fit and support!!
customer_reviews.text: Ohhhh my goodness!! As a 32dd, I have an impossible time getting sports bras to fit. The extra smalls fit tight enough around my rib cage, but don’t offer nearly enough coverage, and larger sizes are too loose to be supportive. I’ve found a couple good ones, but they are always the two shoulder strap style, like a normal bra. I’m so excited to have the right fit and support in a racer back!! The underwire gives good shape too, so I could probably wear this under regular summer clothes. No uni-boob! Love this so much, and the price can’t be beat, so I’ll be buying several more!!
customer_reviews.author: Lori K

customer_reviews.title: Mixed bag but I am keeping it.
customer_reviews.text: Fills a niche in my wardrobe but I am not acquiring more than one. I am glad the straps are adjustable length. Quality construction. Doesn’t have those removable pads that I hate. The cup gives a smooth appearance under T-shirt. I like the racer back which keeps straps up. It’s not a super comfortable bra, but it doesn’t slack on lifting and separating. It’s not the easiest to get in to, but not too bad when you learn how. I wish I could find a similar supportive bra without the underwire. I also wish the white bra was solid white. It has a narrow line of dark trim. I got this to wear under white shirts.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth the Hassle
customer_reviews.text: This bra seemed like it had potential. The cups covered well, the straps weren't slipping, and the band fit. However, it was also really, really hard to get hooked. The band is too tight to hook and just pull over your head. You have to keep it unhooked, get it on, then reach behind your back and hook it. That wouldn't have been a deal breaker except that this bra was so uncomfortable over time. The wire under my arm dug in painfully. It was bad enough after just a few hours' wear that I could still feel the spot where it was digging in the next day. I returned this one.
customer_reviews.author: LBH 1980

customer_reviews.title: DING DONG THE UNIBOOB IS GONE
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited to have found this product to replace my Maia one. The Maia's quality has gone way down while the price is as high as ever, so finding an alternative was paramount. This bra is awesome. Getting it on is a bit of a project but so worth it. Keeps big boobs FIRMLY in place for running, jumping around etc, but shapes/lifts/separates so well that it looks fine under clothes. No more terrible smashed uniboob! I will buy more of these.
customer_reviews.author: C. J. Daniel

customer_reviews.title: I love how there is not a seam across the center ...
customer_reviews.text: Very surprised at how well this bra provides support. I'm a DD cup and I can use this for my Cross Fit classes. I love how there is not a seam across the center of my breasts and that I appear to have two breasts instead of one! However, when I run distances (even a mile), I still feel much more secure in my Enell.
customer_reviews.author: Classic Fan

customer_reviews.title: Finally a bra for big boobs
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough good things about this. I am used to paying a lot of money for my bras. I am a 34G usually. I’ve recently taken up running and needed an upgrade & I can’t believe how well this fits. It holds me together while running, no uniboob, & the back is super flattering. One negative is that it’s hard to get on and off because you can’t actually undue it completely. But, I manage and it’s worth it. The price is a steal. I bought the black one and it matches with everything! I’ve also washed it three times now and it has not lost form or shrunk at all. It’s a real keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta W

customer_reviews.title: Finally found the perfect DD sports bra!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a DD. Been looking for a decent sports bra for literally 30 years. This is the one. I loved it so much I immediately ordered another one in a different color. So comfortable, very supportive (I play tennis and it keeps everything in place) and flattering! You know how most sports bras squish you in so look like a giant loaf of bread? Nope. This one is designed so it has distinct cups. Looks good and feels great while also keeping the jiggle to a minimum. Love the racer back too. Takes a lot of pressure off the parts of my shoulders where normal bra steps have worn a groove.
customer_reviews.author: Nellie's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Need help getting into!
customer_reviews.text: Once I am wearing the bra, it is great....BUT getting into it is a pain. I have found no other way except to put it on over my head and hope I can clasp it by myself backwards or that my husband is around to do it for me! For that reason alone, I will still be looking for the perfect bra in which to golf elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: michelle mason

customer_reviews.title: Pullover with a clasp....bad design for larger chests
customer_reviews.text: Considering that this is made for large busts, the design is terrible because you have to pull an underwired bra OVER your head and try to then put yourself into the cups.....you get a workout just doing that! Returned the item.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: Finding a bra in my size with out breaking the bank...SCORE!!!!! This is hands down more comfortable than my regular everyday bra so I will but more! It helps also to know your size. I took the time to go to a reputable department store and got a proper fitting. Needless to say I was shocked. The size I had been wearing was too small!!! I went from a 34C to actually being a 34DDD! (Not bragging just shocked!) What a difference a proper fitting makes! As stated above, I will but this again!
customer_reviews.author: Donald B Ward

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and support!
customer_reviews.text: This bra is amazing whether you are wearing it while working out or not. Offers great support, comfortable, soft, well-made and with the added benefit of giving you a slight posture correction in you upper, mid, back. As soon as I put it on I felt a release in my neck and delt muscles that have been bothering me lately, never thinking it was my bra or posture that was adding to the soreness back there. I will be buying more. AND it makes your silhouette look great! Not bulky or matronly at all.
customer_reviews.author: LALLAW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: This fits perfectly. I have been struggling with a proper fitted bra, especially a sports bra, for some time. The minute I put this on, I felt the difference. It has good support, the straps do not dig in, I’m not falling out on top or on the sides under my arms, and there is no gapping. Just enough padding for support. This is the best bra purchase I have made in a very long time. Most sport bras just push you in and together which causes me to chafe. The underwire does not dig in, helps separate, and gives you form. I’m very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Sports Bra I Have Ever Had!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the BEST sports bra I have found to date! Before you choose your size, go to Le Mystere’s site and follow their instructions for measuring. Use the size you get there, and your fit should be really nice. This bra fits “firm” as a sports bra for a large-busted woman should. It’s not loose like a comfort fit, but if it was it wouldn’t perform like you need it to. The availability of sizes and adjustability is just fantastic. I am so glad I found this bra! I will definitely buy more. I would love to have one in every color!
customer_reviews.author: Anita Rawls

customer_reviews.title: Great control and breast support!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a sports bra that I didnt have to wear a bra underneath. Something that would support and that would keep my "girls" stable while jumping and running and this is perfect!!! I'm normally a 34 DDD but I gained a little weight so it took me up to 34DDDD and I got a 34F and it was perfect. It's comfy, great support. The only catch is figuring out how to close the strap at bottom. my sister ending up doing it. Ill try again next time. But Its wort the money! I would buy again in more colors if needed!
customer_reviews.author: Tiers

customer_reviews.title: Good Support but So Many Seams
customer_reviews.text: My breasts are a 36B but lately I have been craving more support. I bought a VS underwire sports bra and love it. Unlike the VS that has the underwire and stitching beneath a smooth fabric that touches the skin, this bra is stitched like a normal bra where you can see the underwire and all of the stitching. The inner material is also quite scratchy. I have sensitive skin and I am pretty certain that this would chafe me if I worked out in it. It appears well-constructed but it doesn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Love it! "Girls" are happy too
customer_reviews.text: This bad girl fits perfectly (38D ordered). It's a little challenge to get on at first, and more challenging to get off, but I appreciate that it has a closure in the back to make that easier. Good molded cups, excellent support even for running, jumping, etc. Very comfortable and dare I say cute? For a sports bra :-) I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ReadingMachine

customer_reviews.title: Very flattering
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice bra and it looks really good--breasts are lifted without obnoxious projection or distortion. It holds firmly and covers fully. My only complaint is that there is a bit of buckling/wrinkling near where the upper portion of cup transitions to the strap. I have purchased 4 of these bras and this buckling issue occurs with 2 of them and only on the right side. Maybe it's a personal anatomy issue? Whatever the cause, it's still one of the best bras I've found for my tough to fit 34F size.
customer_reviews.author: MasterStudent

customer_reviews.title: Just say NO to UNIBOOB
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS. It’s super tight, but still allows you to breathe and move around in comfort. I wear a 40DD, so typically when I do cardio, I just wear 2 or 3 sports bras to hold my boobs in place. But with THIS slice of magic, it supports without crushing your little ladies and (my favorite part) it keeps your boobs SEPARATED. And I only have to wear ONE BRA. It’s so hard to find a sports bra that does it’s job and looks good doing it, but this one does it right!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: I really like the support of this bra. I have been looking for a good racer back bra and I found it! I ordered another one in a different color and will probably order more. This bra fits very well, no spillage and pretty comfortable. My only complaint is that it is difficult to put on. I mean it's not totally unreasonable, but wish it were easier. I have spent $100s of dollars trying to find a good racerback bra for medium impact workouts to no avail, this is a great find.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: UGH.. Updated..
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for the price... I like that I can wear it and it doesn't give me a uni-boob! Great for hiking and bike riding. Haven't tried using it running or strenuous exercises... **Update. I wore this running for the first time. There is a section of a seam on the left strap that rubbed my skin raw!! Would not recommend this bra at all. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Great Sports Bra
customer_reviews.text: I have such a hard time with bras at the store, so I never buy them at Amazon, but I took a chance with this one based on the reviews, and I’m glad I did. I hate sports bras that give you mono-boob and that you have to dislocate your shoulder to get into. This bra does not do either of those things. It holds the girls in tightly without being uncomfortable and it’s easy to get on/off. I normally wear a 36DD or DDD and I bought a 36DD in this bra and it fits perfectly. I wash but don’t put in the dryer, although you probably could, it seems well made.
customer_reviews.author: Easter Clan

customer_reviews.title: Love this bra
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for this bra for a long time! I specifically wanted a racerback , an underwire , lightly lined, sports bra with support and comfort for a busty 36G. This bra fit the bill and the bonus was the price. I have high quality, higher priced bras that I didn't think were all that comfortable so I wasn't planning on loving this bra. I normally wear a 34G, but with all sports bras I go up a band size. I love it, this is actually my second one and I could buy a third for the price I normally pay for one! At least try it.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Not even close
customer_reviews.text: I thought that because of the great rating, this would be a better sports bra. It's made of super cheap material, but the worst is that the size is totally off. I ordered a 36D, and what I received was by NO means or stretch of the imagination, a 36D. It was at least 2 sizes too small and I now have to return it. VERY disappointed and not sure how it got such good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Jeni Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Great hold for plus gals
customer_reviews.text: This is the first racer back sports bra that hold firm enough to do real exercise like running and aerobics. I had to go up a cup size to avoid the side spillage. The material is soft. There is a bit more padding in the cup then I normally like (because of size of the gals) but I also don’t have a nips problem. So if you have that problem this bra is thick enough to cover. Also even though you have to put it on like a Tshirt it wasn’t too difficult to get into.
customer_reviews.author: Taryntoo

customer_reviews.title: Finally found a great bra!
customer_reviews.text: Okay ladies 36DD here anyone over a c cup knows how hard it is to find a supportive sports bra that doesn’t cost as much as a whole outfit. I’ve never found a flattering and supportive bra that I would actually buy again. I took this bra out for a nice jog and I love it. The cups are shaped really well and the fit is very snug and secure. I didn’t have to adjust like I have with other bras in the past. I ordered my usual size and the fit was just right.
customer_reviews.author: Peachesmgee

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm an active 36DD woman who prefers underwire bras. Sports bras preferably. I do not like the ladies to be smashed together and getting sweaty. Unfortunately, it's hard to find what I want and affordable to boot. I actually bought three bras when I bought this one. I spent more on the others. This was my favorite. Ever. It's so comfortable, it keeps them where they're supposed to be, the straps aren't sliding every so often. I'm truly glad I decided at the last second to throw this order on. I've just ordered another. The only downside is the color selection. Specifically, the contrasting trim. I highly recommend this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie

customer_reviews.title: I loved it so much I bought 2 more!
customer_reviews.text: I have a pretty physical job; a lot of bending, lifting up high, twisting, carrying heavy things, moving around a LOT. Ordinary bras just weren't supportive enough so I started looking into sports/active bras. After some research and reading a lot of reviews I decided to try this one out. This bra is excellent at keeping everything secure and in place all day no matter what I'm doing. No need to "adjust" at any time throughout the day, as is the case CONSTANTLY with ordinary bras, which is so annoying. The fit is snug, as is should be for a workout bra. But I'd say it's pretty true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Grace E Reardon

customer_reviews.title: Sooooooo Comfortable!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am not a small girl (up top anyways), and currently wear a 36DDD in regular bras, so you can imagine how fun it is to try and find a Sports Bra that can contain the girls! This one does the trick and it does so VERY comfortably! I did have to go up to a 38E according to their size chart, but it fits PERFECTLY. So, I HIGHLY recommend checking your measurements against the chart and using that size. Easy to get on, super comfy, and I can do jumping jacks without fear of two black eyes! What more could you want!!! Highly recommend! I've already ordered two more. :)
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Ford

customer_reviews.title: Sized small, but very comfy!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bra! Follow the advice of many other reviews and go up at least one or two cup sizes and down a band size. I typically wear a 32-34 D/DD, but went with the 32E and it’s perfect!it feels very supportive without being constructing. I don’t find it that difficult to put on/take off, but I’m comparing it to a couple other sports bras I have that are! I love the light lining and I find this comfortable enough to sleep in. I’ve ordered more!
customer_reviews.author: RuaLia's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great support and shape for large busts
customer_reviews.text: This is the best sports bra I’ve found in a while!! I’m a 36DDD/E, and this bra offers great support for even high impact workouts, there’s very little movement while running and jumping. And it creates a really flattering shape under tshirts, definitely no uniboob. The only downside is that it is a little hard to put on/take off because of the connected racer back. But overall, great support, comfortable once on, and flattering! I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: amerka

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed, not my style
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made sports bra that would be effective for high impact activities. The bra fully cups the chest in a way that I do not particularly like, but others might find preferable. You can get a sense of this from the retailer's photos. I also prefer a little cleavage with my sports bras, which these do not provide as a result of the design. I wear a 34C in VS sports bras and I found this bra to run slightly smaller in the same size.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value for the product
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant about purchasing this product without first trying it on. I initially purchased one bra and now have four because they fit so well, are comfortable for all day wear, adjust in multiple ways, and have held up to frequent washings. Machine washed in laundry bags, line dried. I love this bra so much that I blogged about it! I'm a distance runner and this bra holds the girls in place, gives me shape without flattening, and doesn't dig in anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: CrystalGSB

customer_reviews.title: Good underwire sports bra
customer_reviews.text: This is the first underwire sports bra I've purchased. I was skeptical at first but wanted to try it since it got so many good reviews. The bra is well made and comfortable. I think it might be a touch bigger than regular bras in my given cup and band size but its still a good fit for weight lifting and light cardio. I also wear it doing yardwork and plan to wear it hiking. However, I dont run in this bra; I'm sure you could but I prefer a different style of running bra.
customer_reviews.author: Gen217

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Its was so hard to find something so comfortable, supportive, light weight and breathable.just got it today and tried right away HIIT exercise and running,no bouncing very happy.i wear regularly 36DDD got 36DD and it fits right.I love that it separates the breast.Just ordered 2 more and will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Coolbreeze

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Best.Sports.Bra.Ever. I am large and getting these girls under control while I exercise has been a major challenge (to the point of wearing TWO sports bras-ugh) And this bra is just perfect!!! Comfy, no uni-boob, and NOT a bit o' movement no matter what I'm doing! LOVE LOVE LOVE ... bought 3 of them -- WORTH THE PRICE!! And will definitely continue to come back as needed!!! Thank you!!!!
customer_reviews.author: S Boone

customer_reviews.title: Supportive for running
customer_reviews.text: This is a very supportive bra for running. I have a large chest (38F- I bought the 40E and it’s perfect) and used to have to wear two sports bras to run. With this bra I do not! The racer back style lets me wear cute racerback tanks too without my straps showing. It works great under regular tank tops as well. I have bought 5 of these now so I don’t have to do workout laundry as often, because this is the only sports bra I ever wear now! I’ve had one for 2 years, so they seem pretty durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable sports bra ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable sports bra I have ever worn. It offers decent support. Not 100% bounce-free but enough support for the activities that I'll do. It's flattering under tee shirts and has good lines. I ordered the largest cup size available, and it's a nice fit. If this style was available in a larger cup, I'd order it. I do think the band runs a tad large. I could have probably gone down a size on the band.
customer_reviews.author: jami5175

customer_reviews.title: Best. Sports bra. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews but just had to for this sports bra. As a large (36DDD) chested gal, I've searched forever to find a sports bra that would work. Ladies, this is the holy grail for us! Supportive and comfortable with NO dreaded uniboob (you know what I'm talking about!). The racerback allows me to wear all the cute workout tops I've been dreaming of. It's a little tricky to get in to, but it's not a big deal at all. Do you and your girls a favor and get this bra today!
customer_reviews.author: BENen

customer_reviews.title: Not great if you’re high chested...
customer_reviews.text: I can’t really pinpoint one thing that bugs me about this bra BUT I’m super picky when it comes to sports bras. I’ve had 4 kids, but my chest isn’t too large, and I have normal post breastfeeding cosmetic issues with my girls...Some sag, and prominent nipples. I’m also high chested which can cause challenges when stuffing my breasts into preformed wire cups on a sports bra. I feel the cup doesn’t take in my whole breast but the vibes isn’t too big. A smaller cup size would not work. Anyway, I’m keeping it but it’s my backup when other faves are dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great fitting, quality sports bra
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing/trying on at least 8-10 other sports bras, this is the one that fit the best. The material is substantial enough to feel supportive and comfortable, and not flimsy at all like some of the others. Fits well along the rib cage and back, and does not cause back bulges that look flabby! I purchased a 34C, and it was the only one with cups that fit correctly as well, without side overage. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shar G

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FIT, great support and minimal bounce
customer_reviews.text: It's always a saga trying to find the perfect sports bra for a DD cup. something that supports , doesn't give you "uni-boob" , isn't suffocating or a workout to put on/take off, and most importantly something that minimizes bounce during high impact exercise. This was amazing and I'm going to buy another one. I have the Panache underwire one as well, which I paid over $75 for, and this one is just as good, if not better. I'm actually surprised with how good it is for the price, and it's comfortable enough to wear daily too.
customer_reviews.author: Richa Langella

customer_reviews.title: UNICORN bra! Comfort AND performance!
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for years for a sports bra that is comfortable enough to be worn 12 hours a day and actually performs like I need it to without breaking the bank. With all the bras I've tried my upper back would wind up killing me after a few hours. I wear a 34DD and this bra is seriously a unicorn. It's so comfortable that I actually forget that it's on, back pain is gone, AND it holds everything in. Seriously. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Styrene

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, a little bad
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 34DDD and I ordered a 34F (same thing). I'm an auto mechanic and the only female one at my shop, I needed something that gave me support and some coverage without uniboobing away my much enjoyed feminine features. This did that very well. However, despite my breast fitting the cups perfectly I experienced an irrating rubbing from the wired along my ribs under my armpit. I'm not sure if it's actually a design flaw or if I'm just sensitive there, but it was annoying enough to make me subconsciously keep trying to move it. I with keep this one, but probably not order another.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon J.

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great fit!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing !! I can’t believe I’ve been spending twice this amount on bras where the straps disintegrate and lose elasticity a week after first use. You can even exercise in it without falling out all over. It conceals back fat excellently. Good quality. A few reviews mention difficulty getting into it but if you slide it over your head without undoing the strap it’s pretty easy to get on/off. The only other issue is that bc it is racer-back style it tends to show if you wear a top with a boat neck or a wider opening. I find this improves my posture since I’m no longer hunched over.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: Best sports bras I own!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE!! Such great quality for the price!! I started off buying one of these to try out and ended up buying 3 more in different colors. It’s great to be able to purchased based on bra size, so the fit was perfect. I have trouble with side boob in many of my sports bras, but not with these. I’m a 36DD and the support me well in my bootcamp style workouts. They are even comfortable enough to wear all day if you have errands to run after the gym. You won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn  Thorpe

customer_reviews.title: Very supportive, a bit small in the cup size
customer_reviews.text: I really like everything about this (material, super supportive) except that the cups were too small for me. Since I'm a 34D-DD, I'm going to try out the 34DD next. For someone who is a solid 34D I could see this being a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Otoki

customer_reviews.title: Fit is great!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say many bad things about this bra. The only con is that I didn't realize it is a pull over bra as opposed to a regular style snap back. But if you can move past that then I recommend the bra for sure. I am a 38 DD and it fit perfectly and it is comfortable. I went running yesterday and it didn't bother me at all. I also tried wearing as an all day bra and no bother there either.
customer_reviews.author: Alina

customer_reviews.title: Love this one
customer_reviews.text: This my second time buying this bra but this time in a different size. I measure as a 34 G and this fits perfectly. My only complaint is that it’s hard to get on, (I have broad shoulders) but once it’s on, it’s awesome. Can not beat the price and is better support than my cacique bras which are 3xs as much. It’s hard to find an affordable racer back bra and this is a winner.
customer_reviews.author: shell

customer_reviews.title: Best bra for big boobs
customer_reviews.text: Best sports bra EVER! At 40DD I have tried everything, and for the price, nothing has the control, quality, and comfort of this one. I use it for dance and running and am kept very secure. 18 months in, I just bought a second one, only because the back part of the band in my old one was starting to ride up a little from multiple washings. But again, for the price, you can easily buy one every year or two. Only drawback for me? Really hard to get out of once you're all sweaty. I just consider it part of my cardio though--still my favorite bra ever!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Delaney

customer_reviews.title: Not all colors are the same size wise
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one a few months back. It was ok and I liked it enough to buy a second one. I picked a different color. It was about half the size cup wise despite the tag saying the same thing as the first one. I returned that one and got a different color again. This one is more in line size wise with the first one. So If you can get the right size then you'll be set cause they are nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you are a D cup, please read this
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I am a fan of full coverage bras because I am a D cup. I like to feel supported. Well this bra is totally awesome for being a supportive, full coverage bra. I would say it provides medium support for sports. I would never wear this bra on a run. I use my Brooks Moving Comfort bra (purchased on Amazon) or the Enell sports bra. You will NOT MOVE in either one of those bras. Ban the bounce! So back to this bra...I will wear it a lot. Just not for high impact sports activities.
customer_reviews.author: J M

customer_reviews.title: Underwire cuts!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted a bra that didn’t give me UNIBOOB and this definitely fits that bill. BUT the underwire cuts into me on the sides about 30 mins into a yoga session. I wore it to an all day teacher training session and it took me 2 days to get rid of the red marks and bruises from the underwire! So good for short term, but don’t plan on wearing it longer than a short class :(
customer_reviews.author: B. Myers

customer_reviews.title: It was okay
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based off so many good review but it just doesn't work for me. I went by my bra size on their charts and it was a little to big at the top of the cups. I went for a run in it and it was just uncomforatble to me. I'm not sure if it was b/c of the underwires or the fit but i just didn't like it. maybe a friend will fit into it better so it doesn't go to waste. I'm a 36C for reference.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel G

customer_reviews.title: Good value, more like medium-impact in larger sizes
customer_reviews.text: Cute bra that fits well. Cuts down on bounce, but is more medium-impact than high-impact, which makes sense in a large (34E) size in a non-uniboob design. It's still comfortable and supportive enough for a trip to the gym, and keeps everything nice and separated so there's no chafing, which is a lot more than I expected for a $22 bra. I do feel like I could've maybe gone down a band size for more support, but with the back design as it is I don't think I'd be able to pull a smaller size over my shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Steph S.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I work out and lift seven days a week. This sports bra doesn't "smoosh" the girls together and has superior support! Measure yourself first to get the right size. I did and it paid off. It's not hard to get on and it is the first sports bra that I have owned that actually fits perfect and move with me during my heavy workouts. Plus it looks amazing under a tank top. Gotta have a bit of fashion with your function! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: WA mom

customer_reviews.title: Worth it finally
customer_reviews.text: Just make sure you buy a bigger toros strap size. I’m regularly a 36 ddd or 36e or f. I had to send back the 36 e and get the 38e because the strap is a bit tight. It was fine standing up but sitting down a bit tight and hard to breathe. Lmao. Anyway moved up a size and I use the shortest clips and it’s perfect. I wish they made an in between size but cest la vie. Go ahead and buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: runs small
customer_reviews.text: All in all, this is a decent value. That said, if you have back fat this bra is going to make it look much worse! The wide, numerous straps aren't that comfortable and emphasize the rolls. AND it's as if you need instructions on how to put this thing on! Also, check the sizing provided by the manufacturer. I moved up a cup size and I am glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: Janlyn

customer_reviews.title: I wear a 38C, ordered a large, fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: I have to say this is the first sports bra I’ve been completely satisfied with. Most importantly, it lifts and separates, my number one problem with every sports bra - after 5 minutes of movement I have one boob in the middle of my chest. I am an active 57 yr old grandmother and THIS bra makes the girls look and feel 27. Ha! I’ve already ordered a second one.
customer_reviews.author: B. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: First sport bra ever to actually fit. True to size. However, getting into it is difficult. The tag on the bra indicates that the straps adjust in front, but that is not the case (on the two bras I ordered) and made getting into the bra that much more difficult. Just a few adjustments to the design would make this sport bra perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Peds

customer_reviews.title: My favorite work out bra
customer_reviews.text: My never ending quest for a sports bra is over! I wear a 36 ddd and have bought hundreds of dollars of bras that dont fit right. Either make a uni- boob...or push out the sides or dont support. This bra is awesome. It keeps the shape of the bust area. Supported great while doing high impact exercise. And is super comfy. I will be ordering every color!
customer_reviews.author: Kari Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Almost good for high impact
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I really liked this product. It's comfortable and flattering at the same time. I am very chesty and always am looking for sports bras that will hold up to HIIT workouts without giving uniboob. It definitely gives a good shape, is very comfortable, but it allowed a bit more movement than I would want out of a product that's marketed as high impact. For those who are A-C cups, this would probably work better for high impact. For those D+, probably should use this more for hiking, yoga, etc. type activities.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy. I am currently pregnant. Normally, I can just wear a small, generic sports bra, usual bra size 32D. I go up two cup sizes when pregnant, making my chest just too big for a generic sports bra, I spill out the top and bottom. This fits perfectly, I feel supported enough for light impact exercise without my chest looking like a compressed, lumpy mess.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Banta

customer_reviews.title: Great bra for working out.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the sports bra. it was hard to find one for a plus size person. However, this one I can wear while working out and I can wear during the day it is very comfortable. I got two of them. I had to go up a cup size in the second one but they both fit well it's just I felt more comfortable working out in a bigger cup size. All in all I really like this sports bra.
customer_reviews.author: Mike L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sports Bra
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable for a sports bra with the thicker straps that give added support, and I appreciate the cups being large enough that there’s no spillage from the top but beware larger breasts will still bounce/have some movement (DD). Good for light to moderate workouts however for high impact activities I still have to wear a compression bra over it.
customer_reviews.author: BabyGyrlK

customer_reviews.title: Good Support
customer_reviews.text: Normally, I wear size 36DDD, but ordered a 34G. It fits amazingly. Impact bounce is limited much more in this bra than any of the others I have tried...this is a BIG deal for me. Just bought another one.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Fagerstrom

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite Sports Bra!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sports bra! It is very supportive with very little bounce . It has light padding, which I didn't realize until it arrived, but I actually liked the padding. I am large busted and I thought it would add unnecessary size to my bust but it didn't. This bra is extremely comfortable. and I am going to purchase a few more. I have been wearing the high impact powerback sports bra from this company for a few years now for a tennis but I am now switching to this style. It's more comfortable and does a better job!
customer_reviews.author: kcell

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable sports bra
customer_reviews.text: I am large busted and have had a very hard time finding a sport bra that really fits well and is affordable. I was skeptical ordering this. Once received, I tried it on and immediately loved it. Holds this boobies where they should be!! I bought it for my special tops I wear at my Zumba Gold class but like it so much, I wear it for daily use. Which is why I just bought one in another color. My only complaint because I am large busted is that it is a struggle to get into. But that fact it holds me well and is comfortable, I can deal with the struggle.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Charette

customer_reviews.title: Great bra for big boobs!
customer_reviews.text: This bra is great for large boobs and high impact exercise! I like that it keeps the ladies separated and supported while working out. I do wish it wasn't connected in the back so it would be a little easier to get in and out of but it's not too bad. I normally use the zip front Victoria secret bras which are twice the price and this one performs just as well!
customer_reviews.author: Mspo

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, supportive and price is right
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It's so hard to find bra-sized sports bras and I am small but busty, so the standard S-M-L sizing does not work for me. This bra is very secure, works for high impact activities and it is easy to put on and adjust. There is not a lot of room for adjusting the straps, so I wish I could make them just a bit tighter (I like the girls jacked up high!). But, this is a real deal when you consider what you pay for things like this at a department store.
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: Solid low-mid impact sports bra
customer_reviews.text: For the price and for the size I wear, it's a good choice. I don't use it to run - I've got a SheFit for that. But for barre class and weight training it's good. Keeps the girls in place but not squished, and the trim proves it's a sports bra for when you see it poke out from under a tank. Some brands I'm a 36 and some a 34. I bought 36 but after having a while I wish I had gone for the 34 as I use the closest hook.
customer_reviews.author: K. Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Great even for everyday wear
customer_reviews.text: This bra is awesome. I wear a 38 DD and they are were they are suppose to be. No sagging, nothing uncomfortable and a miracle to me. When I wear mine,I look like I had breast surgery. They no longer droop or sag or sway every which way. WooHoo
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this bra!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bra. I originally bought the 34C in white. I'm 5'4" 190. I play rugby and teach Les Mills BodyAttack. I took it for a test drive last night, and I just bought three more in different colors. The straps are strong and didn't move at all during the class. I never once had to think about my bra and it wasn't too hard to get out of. I really love this bra and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Putnam

customer_reviews.title: Excellent support ( adding to my review)
customer_reviews.text: I love this bra. Its very comfortable and true to size I will order another one. After wearing this bra for a few weeks I still love it but it would be difficult to get off and on if you are not flexible in the shoulders! After working out it difficult to get this damp bra off......but I still love and have bought another one!
customer_reviews.author: lorac

customer_reviews.title: OMG...finally.
customer_reviews.text: (I'm 204 lbs, 5'9", DD/E). A high impact bra that actually works on my DD-F boobs!!!!!! (I SWEAR it is different every time I've been measured!) But too be fair my weight has changed a lot....ok, I'm digressing. But it holds them like a high impact bra should. I've assumed I will always have to get the snap in the back on my sports bras, but this bra makes it work. In fact, I'm only writing this review because I came on to buy more. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Juliana

customer_reviews.title: Fits well. No uniboob!
customer_reviews.text: Got it on with not too much difficulty (I put it on the right way and clasped it in the back). Not super easy but not a big deal. Its super comfortable and I feel like I'll have enough support for everything but the most rigorous workout. Only issue is that the underwire doesn't lie flat under one of my arms so it might get irritating after a while.
customer_reviews.author: A. Tingolie

customer_reviews.title: Good support-maybe pick a size smaller
customer_reviews.text: My wife recently had an augmentation and needed bounce control. She's currently 36DDD, which isn't offered. We went with the 36E and it was good, just not as "supportive" as it could be. I ordered her a 36DD and it's definitely better, but they still bounce. Could be a little better with as much "structure" there is to the bra itself. As implants won't compress like natural tissue, perhaps you should run a next size down if you're looking for more bounce restriction!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Bra Runs Very Small
customer_reviews.text: I like the design concept of this sports bra, but it does not come even close to fitting. I ordered one cup size larger than I normally wear, but the bra did not fit. Even the band width is at least two sizes smaller than I normally wear. I will be returning the bra, but probably will not exchange for another size because I have no idea what size will fit.
customer_reviews.author: S Pilgreen

customer_reviews.title: Most amazing sports bra
customer_reviews.text: This is the best sports bra I have ever purchase! You cant even feel the underwire in it. Having DD it is extremely hard to find supportive and comfortable sports bras for working out. They also dont give you the squished and flattened out look that a lot of sportsbras can give. They are also pretty enough that I plan to wear under tank tops in the summer that shows the racerback straps for the "strappy" look that has been in fashion the past few summers. I have bought 2 in each color and hope they make more colors! I'd give it a million stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: N. Hoover

product_meta.title: SYROKAN Women's Full Support High Impact Racerback Lightly Lined Underwire Sports Bra
feature_bullets: Workout bra with wire for high impact activities
Minimize bounce thanks to foam-lined underwire cups
Encapsulated cups adds support and avoids uni-boob
Back adjustable stretch straps with stylish racerback detail
